text: Stella (Estella Carolina) Simons (November 5, 1888 in Amsterdam – January 30, 1989 in Wassenaar) was a Dutch lawyer and feminist. Simons undertook many activities in the field of child protection, care for the poor and feminism. She received recognition through her honorary membership (in 1934) from the UVSV and (in 1954) from the VVAO. Moreover, in 1958 she was appointed Officer in the Order of Orange-Nassau. ==References== Category:1888 births Category:1989 deaths Category:Dutch women lawyers Category:20th-century Dutch lawyers Category:Recipients of the Order of Orange-Nassau Category:20th- century women lawyers
title: Stella Simons
